name: New York Mysteries: The Lantern of Souls
description: As a journalist, Laura James is again brought in to investigate a strange murder. What starts as a routine investigation quickly takes a dark turn. New York Mysteries: The Lantern of Souls is an adventurous hidden object game with puzzles and mini-games.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 900 MB available space Sound Card: yes

reviews.review_text: I've played the other NY Mysteries and they were great and this is just as good. I love the story line, adventure and hidden objects. Its very entertaining without being too violent or dark.
